QuestData.Title: Young Hearts
QuestData.Description: My nephew never pays attention to his surroundings. In his eagerness to prove himself, he has strayed from the pack -- again.$b$bHe reminds me of myself when I was a youngling.$b$bIf you see Orac, tell him to return home. We need to finish preparing for tomorrow's hunt.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Orac and tell him to return home to his uncle.
